Description: The student's father works as a teacher.
The student's mother has no education or only Primary school education until 4th grade.
The student's mother is a house wife.
The student's mother works in another field than teaching, health care, civil services (e.g. administrative or police) or at home.
The student has a high number of absences (more than 21)
The student belongs to to the older part of the class (older than 19 years)
The student has failed a maximum of one class.
The student has failed an average number of classes (2 classes).
The student has failed many classes (three classes or more).
The student's family size is rather small (less or equal to three).
The student has an average health status.
The student is willing to to take higher education.
The student takes extra paid classes.
The student studies little (less than five hours per week).
